channel.title: Making self admin 714
channel.description: Title says it all, and yes... i know it is in player.java But u can't find ANYTHING to do with making yourself owner, its different from other 667+ Any help will be fine thanks, source is matrix 714.

item.title: Making self admin 714
item.dc:creator: @The_Legendary_Leeche The Legendary Leecher
item.description:
@The_Legendary_Leeche wrote:

Is it so hard to make your own command to get Admin?

Another leecher who thinks he can code 667+…

Sigh… They will never stop.

Read full topic

item.title: Making self admin 714
item.dc:creator: @Broken-Reality Broken-Reality
item.description:
@Broken-Reality wrote:

Cause i is Baws? lol.
this is just a simple problem tbh…

Read full topic

item.title: Making self admin 714
item.dc:creator: @sub-degree sub-degree
item.description:
@sub-degree wrote:

[quote=“Broken-Reality, post:4, topic:465216”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=570071.msg4132249#msg4132249 date=1351250167]

Title says it all, and yes… i know it is in player.java
But u can’t find ANYTHING to do with making yourself owner, its different from other 667+
Any help will be fine thanks, source is matrix 714.

Just change the name of the player (yours) who can make people admin :fp:

I think it’s located in Player.java, just search for the original owners name or maybe ‘PlayerRights’.
[/quote]
yeah but he said he couldn’t find anything to do with owner, the easiest thing would to just make the command, on matrix the command is “admin” with out the “( )” so if he adds them, it would be fine…[/quote]
Broken’s Worked out better, thanks.

Read full topic
